title: Enjoy our beautiful landscaped community! 1 bed, 1 bath! 726 Sq Ft!
posting_body: ['Stonetree Apartments', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '2414 Stone Rd', 'East Point, GA 30344', 'show contact info', "Discover the home you've been searching for at Stonetree Apartments in East Point, GA.", 'Select a one, two, or three-bedroom apartment home in a beautiful community, rich with quality amenities.', 'Residents enjoy our on-site fitness center, sundeck, and lush landscaping.', 'Let us not forget about our apartments themselves, with fully equipped kitchens, spacious closets, washer & dryer connections, and so much more.', 'Bedrooms: 1 |  Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 726 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $982 - $1147/Month', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '✓ 24 Hour Availability', '✓ Business Center/Clubhouse', "✓ Children's Playground Area", '✓ Heart Healthy Fitness Center', '✓ Located in The Heart of East Point', '✓ On-Site Maintenance/Management', '✓ Package Service', '✓ Planned Social Activities', '✓ Resident Referral Program', '✓ Sparkling Swimming Pool', '✓ City of Decatur "Award-Winning" Dining Just Minutes Away', '✓ Clothes Care Facility', '✓ Complimentary Wi-Fi At The Business Center, Pool and Sundeck', '✓ DeKalb Farmers Market is a Short Drive', '✓ Less than 15 Minutes from Downtown Atlanta', '✓ Monthly Pest Control', '✓ Northlake Mall and North DeKalb Mall Shopping', '✓ On Marta Bus Line.', 'Kensington and Indian Creek Rail Stations Nearby', '✓ Stone Mountain Park Close By', '✓ Total Electric - Gardens and Townhomes', 'This Unit Comes With:', '✓ Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '✓ Carpeted Floor', '✓ Ceiling Fans', '✓ Central Air Conditioning and Efficient Gas Heat', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Fully-Equipped Eat-In Family Kitchens/Pantry', '✓ Oven', '✓ Range', '✓ Tub/Shower', '✓ Vinyl Flooring', '✓ Designer Mini Blinds', '✓ Fireplace in Select 2 Bedroom Units Only', '✓ Formal Dining Room', '✓ Frost-Free Refrigerator', '✓ High Speed Internet Access', '✓ Linen Closets', '✓ Spacious Storage with Walk-In Closets', '✓ Sunrooms and Private Patios in Select Apartments', '✓ Trash Compactor', '✓ Wet Bar', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Phone-Number:', 'show contact info', 'Pet-Policy: Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Lease-Length: Variable', 'Call for Directions', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '5FF04D1D126E430']
